com.myronmarston.music
Enum NoteName

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<NoteName>
      com.myronmarston.music.NoteName
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<NoteName>
public enum NoteName
extends java.lang.Enum<NoteName>

Enumerates all the valid note names. Also provides a "note number" -- number of half steps the note is above C.

getDefaultNoteNameForNumber

public static NoteName getDefaultNoteNameForNumber(int noteNumber)
                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Gets the default note name for the given number. For example, "5" would yield "F" rather than "E_SHARP".

Parameters:
noteNumber - the number of half steps above C
Returns:
the NoteName
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number is < 0 or > 11
